Welcome to Orange Country Lettings’s documentation!

Project’s Description

Orange County Lettings is a start-up in the property rental sector. The start-up is currently expanding in the United States. You’ll find a variety of rental properties and some profiles.

Changelog:

  • Creating 2 new apps lettings and profile

  • Move models, admin and templtes to respective apps

  • Create migrations to use new models

  • Fix linting

  • Correct plural of address in admin

  • Add docstrings

  • Add tests

  • Add Sentry and Logging

  • Create a CI/CD pipeline

  • Deploy application on Render

  • Create documentation on Read The Docs
